name: Rpi gpio test nodejs
tagline: Raspberry Pi GPIO read/write with Node.js
body:
rpi_gpio_test_nodejs ==================== Raspberry Pi GPIO read/write with Node.js This example shows how to read and write Rapsberry Pi GPIO state with rpi-gpio.js

How to run

Clone this repository and go to the project directory 
$ npm install
$ sudo node index.js
Please note: You must run this in root account. For more info click here.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
